## Checklist

- [ ] `npm run build` compiles without errors
- [ ] Tool descriptions are clear and concise
- [ ] Parameters have descriptions
- [ ] ExtendScript uses ES3 syntax (var, no arrow functions)
- [ ] User strings are escaped with `escapeForExtendScript()`
- [ ] New module registered in `server.ts` (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested with Premiere Pro (if possible)
